title: How to Make a Scorpio Man Obsessed with You

steps.title: Play hard to get by letting him know you have other things to do.
steps.content: Play hard to get by letting him know you have other things to do. When a Scorpio likes you , he won’t mind doing a little bit of chasing —in fact, it will probably only make him like you more. [1] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. Don’t be afraid to be a little hot and cold, or tell him that you’re too busy to see him for one week. For instance, if he asks you to hang out over the weekend, you might say, “Oh, I’d love to, but I’m actually all booked up! Could we try for next week instead?” You can play hard to get , but be encouraging, too! If a Scorpio thinks you aren’t interested, he might just back off completely.

steps.title: No topics are off-limits for the talkative Scorpio.
steps.content: No topics are off-limits for the talkative Scorpio. Be prepared to analyze things that you would have never dreamed of, and don’t be afraid to talk about weird stuff, too. He’ll appreciate that you’re willing to indulge his discussions, and having a fun conversation with you will make him think about you after you leave. [2] X Research source Many Scorpio signs feel comfortable talking about things that might be a little taboo, like sex, intimacy, and human psychology. Try to open your mind a little bit, and don’t be afraid to bring up stuff that you wouldn’t talk about with other people. He might ask you questions like, “Do you think the afterlife is real?” or, “Isn’t it interesting how the brain named itself?” Reader Poll: We asked 610 wikiHow readers who've dated Scorpio men, and only 7% of them agreed that the best way to attract them is by being intelligent and analytical . [Take Poll] So don’t feel like you have to be an expert on deep topics to attract your Scorpio. He’ll likely have enough excitement about the topic for the both of you, and he’ll want to get to know your interests as well!

steps.title: With a Scorpio, flattery goes a long way.
steps.content: With a Scorpio, flattery goes a long way. If he just got a new haircut or he put on a new outfit , be sure to call out these little things, and tell him how much you like them. The more you boost his ego, the more he’ll think about how awesome you are—which will only make him want you more. You might say things like, “Wow, new hairstyle? You totally pull it off.” Or, “Cool outfit! You’re always so on top of the latest trends.”

steps.title: Try not to come off too eager, since that could push him away.
steps.content: Try not to come off too eager, since that could push him away. Instead of always reaching out to make plans first, let him come to you, at least half of the time. That way, he’ll wonder why you haven’t reached out, and he’ll probably think about all the fun stuff you might be doing without him. For example, if you planned a date last week, wait for him to text you and plan something instead of texting him again.

steps.title: If there’s one thing a Scorpio can’t stand, it’s a liar.
steps.content: If there’s one thing a Scorpio can’t stand, it’s a liar. Water signs value honesty very much, so if you tell him a lie (even a little one!), he’s sure to back away from your relationship. Be as honest as possible with him, and don’t sugar coat things, even if you think it might be more kind. [3] X Research source Even small white lies, like telling him you like a gift when you really don’t, might hurt his feelings. Being brutally honest will bring you two even closer than you already are.

steps.title: Scorpios are private people, and they take a while to open up.
steps.content: Scorpios are private people, and they take a while to open up. [4] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. [5] X Expert Source Jessica Lanyadoo Astrologer & Psychic Medium Expert Interview. 12 November 2019. If your Scorpio man shows you the real him, it means he trusts you a lot. Try to accept him for who he is without making any judgements , and he’ll only want you more. [6] X Research source Don’t be offended if it takes him a little while to bare his soul to you. Scorpios are terrified of rejection, and showing someone the real you is very scary.

steps.title: Water signs don’t love displays of vanity.
steps.content: Water signs don’t love displays of vanity. It’s totally fine to spend time on how you look, but try not to obsess over it, especially in front of your man. He’ll appreciate that you’re confident enough to head out without worrying about how you look, and he’ll want to spend much more time with you. In general, you should try to look good for yourself, not anyone else. If you feel confident with your appearance , that’s great! Your Scorpio man will notice, and he’ll like you even more.

steps.title: Scorpio men need a lot of space for themselves.
steps.content: Scorpio men need a lot of space for themselves. Make sure you’re keeping up with your friends, your hobbies, and your career, and let him do the same. If you give him the room to flourish and aren’t breathing down his neck all the time, he’s going to become obsessed with you and your laid back nature. [7] X Research source Plus, this gives him more time to chase you instead of feeling like you’re smothering him.

steps.title: Scorpios love being curious about the people they’re dating.
steps.content: Scorpios love being curious about the people they’re dating. [8] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. Instead of oversharing about yourself, keep a few tidbits back, and only reveal information a little bit at a time. It will make him think more about you, and he’ll probably try to get closer to you to uncover some of your mystery . For instance, instead of saying things like, “I grew up in New Hampshire, but moved to Michigan when I was 12,” you might say, “I’ve kinda lived all over the place. It’s so fun to travel around, especially when you’re young!”

steps.title: Scorpios tend to be a little flirty, even when they’re dating someone else.
steps.content: Scorpios tend to be a little flirty, even when they’re dating someone else. Try not to let this bother you—while it might not seem like it on the outside, Scorpios are intensely loyal, and they’d never do anything to jeopardize your relationship. [9] X Expert Source Jessica Lanyadoo Astrologer & Psychic Medium Expert Interview. 12 November 2019. Let him live his life how he wants to, and you’ll never be able to get rid of him. [10] X Research source He might also have a lot of female friends, too. The best course of action is to be friendly toward them and try to maintain a connection with them. That way, you all become friends, and you’ll be able to see that they aren’t a threat to you.

steps.title: Scorpio signs are very active when it comes to sex.
steps.content: Scorpio signs are very active when it comes to sex. [11] X Expert Source Jessica Lanyadoo Astrologer & Psychic Medium Expert Interview. 12 November 2019. You don’t have to do anything you aren’t comfortable with, but try to keep an open mind, and try things that you’ve never done before. If you’re at least open to his wants and needs, he’ll never let you go. [12] X Research source Scorpio men, in particular, tend to have fairly high sex drives. Try to match his energy, and take the time to initiate sex sometimes, too.
